price: Ó mọ ohunkóhun tó wà nínú àwọn sánmọ̀ àti ilẹ̀. Ó sì mọ ohun tí ẹ̀ ń fi pamọ́ àti ohun tí ẹ̀ ń ṣàfi hàn rẹ̀. Allāhu sì ni Onímọ̀ nípa ohun tó wà nínú igbá-àyà ẹ̀dá.
arabic: يَعۡلَمُ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَيَعۡلَمُ مَا تُسِرُّونَ وَمَا تُعۡلِنُونَۚ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِيمُۢ بِذَاتِ ٱلصُّدُورِ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: yaʿlamu mā fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wayaʿlamu mā tusirrūna wamā tuʿ'linūna wal-lahu ʿalīmun bidhāti al-ṣudūri
